job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As an Azure Engineer in Accenture Technology - Cloud First, you will play a pivotal role in driving our customers' cloud initiatives, leveraging Microsoft's Azure platform to design, build, migrate, and optimize scalable cloud solutions. Your expertise will be crucial in advancing our customers' cloud adoption strategies, ensuring security, and optimizing their infrastructure through effective use of Azure's vast toolset and frameworks. Join our team and contribute to shaping the future of our customers' cloud infrastructure, leveraging your expertise in Azure to drive innovation and excellence.
     * People You will collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, system administrators, and project managers, to ensure seamless integration and operation of cloud services for our customers. Your ability to communicate effectively and mentor junior team members will be essential in fostering a collaborative and efficient working environment.
     * Process You will lead the implementation of the Cloud Adoption Framework for our customers, ensuring their processes align with best practices for cloud governance, security, and compliance. Your role will involve refining and enhancing our customers' DevOps processes, facilitating continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, and automating infrastructure management using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools like Bicep or Terraform.
     * Technology Your in-depth understanding of cloud architecture and Azure's capabilities will be instrumental in designing, building, migrating, and optimizing workloads for robust landing zones and other cloud infrastructure components for our customers. You will utilize Azure DevOps tools and services to streamline project workflows and ensure the reliability and scalability of our customers' cloud environments.
     * Task Day-to-day tasks will include designing and building Azure projects from the ground up for our customers, managing their cloud resources, and ensuring optimal performance and security. You will also be responsible for migrating and optimizing workloads to Azure, troubleshooting and resolving issues related to cloud infrastructure, continuously improving our customers' cloud operations, and staying updated with the latest Azure developments and best practices.

   With all our roles, there is some in-person time for collaboration, learning and building relationships with clients, peers, leaders, and communities. As an employer, we will be as flexible as possible to support your specific work/life needs.
job_details.full_text:
Azure Engineer

As an Azure Engineer in Accenture Technology - Cloud First, you will play a pivotal role in driving our customers' cloud initiatives, leveraging Microsoft's Azure platform to design, build, migrate, and optimize scalable cloud solutions. Your expertise will be crucial in advancing our customers' cloud adoption strategies, ensuring security, and optimizing their infrastructure through effective use of Azure's vast toolset and frameworks. Join our team and contribute to shaping the future of our customers' cloud infrastructure, leveraging your expertise in Azure to drive innovation and excellence.
     * People You will collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, system administrators, and project managers, to ensure seamless integration and operation of cloud services for our customers. Your ability to communicate effectively and mentor junior team members will be essential in fostering a collaborative and efficient working environment.
     * Process You will lead the implementation of the Cloud Adoption Framework for our customers, ensuring their processes align with best practices for cloud governance, security, and compliance. Your role will involve refining and enhancing our customers' DevOps processes, facilitating continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, and automating infrastructure management using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools like Bicep or Terraform.
     * Technology Your in-depth understanding of cloud architecture and Azure's capabilities will be instrumental in designing, building, migrating, and optimizing workloads for robust landing zones and other cloud infrastructure components for our customers. You will utilize Azure DevOps tools and services to streamline project workflows and ensure the reliability and scalability of our customers' cloud environments.
     * Task Day-to-day tasks will include designing and building Azure projects from the ground up for our customers, managing their cloud resources, and ensuring optimal performance and security. You will also be responsible for migrating and optimizing workloads to Azure, troubleshooting and resolving issues related to cloud infrastructure, continuously improving our customers' cloud operations, and staying updated with the latest Azure developments and best practices.

   With all our roles, there is some in-person time for collaboration, learning and building relationships with clients, peers, leaders, and communities. As an employer, we will be as flexible as possible to support your specific work/life needs.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on Azure cloud infrastructure management, DevOps, and traditional software engineering tasks related to cloud environments. It does not mention any specific generative AI models, LLM frameworks, or generative AI-specific tasks like prompt engineering or fine-tuning, which are core to the GenAI Engineer profile. While it involves cloud technologies and MLOps principles, the primary focus is on cloud infrastructure rather than AI model development or deployment. Therefore, it does not fit the ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer profiles and is classified as Ambiguous as it is a traditional cloud engineering role.

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'designing, building, migrate, and optimize scalable cloud solutions', 'designing and building Azure projects from the ground up', and 'building backend services' implicitly through managing cloud environments and CI/CD pipelines.
job_tasks.phrase: design, build, migrate, and optimize scalable cloud solutions

job_tasks.justification: The role involves 'automating infrastructure management using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools like Bicep or Terraform', which is a software development practice applied to infrastructure.
job_tasks.phrase: automating infrastructure management using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools like Bicep or Terraform

job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly mentions 'refining and enhancing our customers' DevOps processes, facilitating continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines' and 'utilize Azure DevOps tools and services to streamline project workflows'.
job_tasks.phrase: refining and enhancing our customers' DevOps processes, facilitating continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines

job_tasks.justification: The role involves 'managing their cloud resources, and ensuring optimal performance and security' and 'troubleshooting and resolving issues related to cloud infrastructure', which are core operational tasks in a cloud environment.
job_tasks.phrase: managing their cloud resources, and ensuring optimal performance and security

job_tasks.justification: The role requires understanding 'customers' cloud initiatives', 'advancing our customers' cloud adoption strategies', and aligning technical solutions with 'best practices for cloud governance, security, and compliance'.
job_tasks.phrase: advancing our customers' cloud adoption strategies

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'designing, building, migrating, and optimizing workloads for robust landing zones and other cloud infrastructure components', which involves the development and integration of cloud infrastructure.
job_tasks.phrase: designing, building, migrating, and optimizing workloads for robust landing zones

soft_skills.phrase: collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, system administrators, and project managers
staying updated with the latest Azure developments and best practices
troubleshooting and resolving issues related to cloud infrastructure
